title: Screen Design:  "Temple of Nuclear Waste," Front Side
medium: Black and color marking pens, graphite, white and blue crayon (?) on white tracing paper
description: Three panel screen on wheels in form of three abstract, highly decorative, colorful buildings.  In the middle, a skyscraper with red top decorated with spirals, a blue lower half, and yellow stepped pediment with two antenae.  On either side of central building, structures in orange with black dots on upper half and blue lower half with Greek key pattern on side edges.  Each structure topped with fan-shaped pediment.  Bases of three buildings with yellow and black triangle pattern.
name: Drawing
